intro: Cynoctonum eurychiton, commonly known as the golden shower tree, is a tropical plant native to Southeast Asia. It is characterized by its long, pendulous clusters of yellow flowers that bloom profusely during the rainy season. The plant has compound leaves composed of several oval-shaped leaflets. It thrives in warm, humid climates and requires well-drained soil for optimal growth. Its ornamental value makes it a popular choice for landscaping in tropical and subtropical regions.
